text:
@KimDotcom Okay. Then we should immediately lower the highway speed limit to 30 mph and outlaw potato chips and ice cream. 

FYI: There's a treatment solution for COVID-19 w/ a 90%+ success rate. It's HCQ + Zinc + antibiotics.
